data.name: Birthdays the Beginning / バースデイズ・ザ・ビギニング - Digital Soundtrack / デジタル・サウンドトラック
data.detailed_description:
The world of Birthdays the Beginning allows you to embark on your very own creative adventure, and what better way to do so than to have the music playing while you explore the real world? With beautiful ambient music that encourage you to delve deeper into the meaning of life and the world around you, this digital soundtrack is the perfect addition to your music library!

The Birthdays the Beginning Digital Soundtrack includes 32 tracks!
  1. This Mysterious World
  2. The Beginning (Title Screen)
  3. The Cube Calls
  4. Civilization
  5. Time Unfolds (Arrangement 1)
  6. Time Unfolds (Arrangement 2)
  7. The End (Guitar)
  8. The End (No Guitar)
  9. Undle the Mantle
  10. Prehistory
  11. Prehistory (Ambience)
  12. Prehistory (Percussion)
  13. Upland Greenery (Arrangement 1)
  14. Upland Greenery (Arrangement 2)
  15. Upland Greenery (Arrangement 3)
  16. Cube Tectonics (Arrangement 1)
  17. Cube Tectonics (Arrangement 2)
  18. Cube Tectonics (Arrangement 3)
  19. Cube Tectonics (Arrangement 4)
  20. Cube Tectonics (Arrangement 5)
  21. Cube Tectonics (Arrangement 6)
  22. Cube Tectonics (Arrangement 7)
  23. Beneath the Sea (High Tempo)
  24. Scorching Sand 1
  25. Scorching Sand 2
  26. Snowdrift
  27. Chimes of Winter (Arrangement 1)
  28. Chimes of Winter (Arrangement 2)
  29. Reaching the Summit
  30. Skies Above (Piano Arrangement)
  31. Skies Above (String Arrangement)

data.short_description: Immerse yourself in the beautiful melodies of Birthdays the Beginning with this gorgeous collection of music from the game! From calm, subtle sounds to exciting tunes that mimic the growth of life around you, this digital soundtrack is the perfect addition to your music library!

fullgame.name: Birthdays the Beginning / バースデイズ・ザ・ビギニング

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
